name.title: Platform Name
name.description: The name of the plugin, e.g. shown in the logs.

mediaTypes.title: Media Types as Motion Sensors
mediaTypes.description: Media types for which a motion sensor is created that triggers when the according media type is present on the Apple TV

deviceStates.title: Device States as Motion Sensors
deviceStates.description: Device states for which a motion sensor is created that triggers when the according device state is present on the Apple TV

remoteKeysAsSwitch.title: Remote Keys as Switches
remoteKeysAsSwitch.description: Remote keys which will be exposed as switches to HomeKit, e.g. to use the remote keys in automations.

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Apple TVs that should not be added as a device. You can get the MAC-Address from the logs.
